title: Six Indian fishermen arrested for poaching in Sri Lankan waters
content: ri Lanka Navy has seized an Indian dhow with 06 Indian fishermen onboard while poaching in Sri Lankan waters. The apprehension was made in seas northwest of the Kovilan Lighthouse, Jaffna during a patrol in the wee hours of Saturday (19).The apprehension was made during a patrol carried out by a Fast Attack Craft of the 4th Fast Attack Flotilla (4 FAF), attached to the Northern Naval Command in seas northwest of the Kovilan Lighthouse.
